title: Cream 15 Years 3CD MOS
description:
Cream has been the clubbing phenomenon of our generation and to mark this amazing feat they?re releasing a collection of their biggest anthems from the last 15 years.

No other brand has pushed the boundaries like Cream, covering all dance music genres throughout the years, from Paul Oakenfold?s world famous residency in the courtyard through to Sasha in the Annexe, the biggest DJ?s in the world have all graced the decks of the world famous club. Cream?s success has spread globally, they return to Ibiza year after year  to hold a weekly residency at one of the biggest clubs on the island and even put on festivals around the globe as far as the U.S. and Asia. The Creamfield?s festival is now in it?s 10th year!

An encyclopedia to the biggest Cream bangers from the last 2 decades, take a step back through the clubbing time machine that is Cream 15 Years. With colossal anthems like Nightcrawlers (Push the Feeling On) Robin S (Show Me Love), Ultra Nate (Free), hedonistic Ibiza hits from the likes of Olive (You&#039;re Not Alone), Masters At Work (To Be In Love), David Morales (Needing You) to the hottest tracks from the last few years including, Storm (Storm) & Sasha (XPander). This is one of the fundamental albums for any house, trance, rave fan across the UK.

Cream 15 Years truly is the only dance album that looks back to the legacy of dance music, all jam packed on 3 explosive CDs. Spring has most definitely begun with this definitive release!!
